detailed_events.description: A player in a green jersey with number 4 passes from the top of the key to a cutting teammate in a red jersey for a layup.
A player in a red jersey drives from the left side and makes a contested layup.
A player in a red jersey makes a pull-up jump shot from the right elbow.
A player in a black jersey passes the ball from inside the paint to a teammate on the left wing for a three-point shot.
A player in a red jersey makes a catch-and-shoot three-pointer from the left wing.
A player in a green jersey makes a jump shot from the top of the key.
A player in a green jersey with number 8 makes a pull-up three-pointer from the top of the key.
A player in a red jersey makes a jump shot from the right elbow.
A player in a red jersey drives to the basket and misses a contested layup.
A player in a red jersey makes a pull-up jump shot from the free-throw line.
A player wearing a black shirt and red shorts misses a three-point attempt from the right wing.
A player in a black jersey drives into the paint and kicks the ball out to a teammate for a three-point shot.
A player in a red jersey makes a catch-and-shoot three-pointer from the top of the key.
A player in a black jersey passes from the top of the key to a teammate in the left corner for a three-point shot.
A player in a red jersey makes a catch-and-shoot three-pointer from the left corner.
A player in a red jersey makes a pull-up jump shot from the left elbow.
A player wearing a black shirt passes the ball to a teammate on the left wing for a three-point shot.
A player in a red jersey makes a catch-and-shoot three-pointer from the left wing.
